Questions.Label: How is your organisation ensuring it's ready to deliver training in apprenticeship standards?
Questions.QuestionBodyText:
Your answer must include how your organisation has:

  • commitment and approval from senior managers to deliver apprenticeship standards
  • a governance group in place to monitor delivery of training
  • an implementation plan specific to apprenticeship training
  • resources that support the delivery of apprenticeship standards

Validations.Name: Required
Validations.ErrorMessage: Tell us how your organisation is ensuring it's ready to deliver training in apprenticeship standards

Validations.Name: MaxWordCount
Validations.ErrorMessage: Your answer must be 275 words or less

Questions.Label: Offering apprenticeship frameworks
Questions.QuestionBodyText:
Apprenticeship frameworks will be replaced by apprenticeship standards by 1 August 2020.

Does your organisation have a plan to transition from apprenticeship frameworks to apprenticeship standards?

Find out more on the withdrawal of apprenticeship frameworks (opens in a new window or tab).

Validations.Name: Required
Validations.ErrorMessage: Tell us if your organisation has a plan to transition from apprenticeship frameworks to apprenticeship standards

Questions.Label: How will your organisation transition from apprenticeship frameworks to apprenticeship standards?
Questions.QuestionBodyText:
Your answer must include how your organisation has:

  • get commitment and approval from senior managers to deliver apprenticeship standards
  • have a governance group in place to monitor delivery of training
  • have an implementation plan specific to apprenticeship training
  • have resources that support the delivery of apprenticeship standards

Your answer must also include when your organisation will do this.

Validations.Name: Required
Validations.ErrorMessage: Tell us how your organisation will transition from apprenticeship frameworks to apprenticeship standards

Validations.Name: MaxWordLength
Validations.ErrorMessage: Your answer must be 275 words or less

Pages.Title: Why will your organisation only deliver apprenticeship frameworks?

Questions.Label: Why will your organisation only deliver apprenticeship frameworks?
Questions.QuestionBodyText: Your answer must include a brief summary of why your organisation does not have a plan to transition to apprenticeship standards.

Validations.Name: Required
Validations.ErrorMessage: Tell us why your organisation will only deliver apprenticeship frameworks

Validations.Name: MaxWordCount
Validations.ErrorMessage: Your answer must be 150 words or less

Pages.Title: Who can we contact about the apprenticeships your organisation will deliver?

Validations.Name: Required
Validations.ErrorMessage: Enter a full name

Validations.Name: MaxLength
Validations.ErrorMessage: Enter a full name using 255 characters or less

Validations.Name: Required
Validations.ErrorMessage: Enter a valid email

Validations.Name: MaxLength
Validations.ErrorMessage: Enter an email using 70 characters or less

Validations.Name: Email
Validations.ErrorMessage: Enter an email in the correct format, like name@example.com

Pages.BodyText: This must be the person who will use the 'Publish to Course Directory' service to enter your organisation's apprenticeships.

Pages.Title: How does your organisation plan to engage and work with awarding bodies?

Questions.Label: How does your organisation plan to engage and work with awarding bodies?
Questions.QuestionBodyText:
Your answer must include how your organisation will:

  • find awarding bodies for relevant apprenticeship frameworks
  • contact awarding bodies
  • get relevant information from awarding bodies
  • engage employers in the process of choosing an awarding body
  • confirm a contract or service agreement with awarding bodies

You'll also need to include what information your organisation will ask from an awarding body to ensure they are suitable.

Validations.Name: Required
Validations.ErrorMessage: Tell us how your organisation plans to engage and work with awarding bodies

Validations.Name: MaxWordCount
Validations.ErrorMessage: Your answer must be 275 words or less

Pages.Title: How will your organisation engage with end-point assessment organisations (EPAO's)?

Questions.Label: How will your organisation engage with end-point assessment organisations (EPAO's)?
Questions.QuestionBodyText:
Your answer must include how your organisation will:

  • find EPAO's for relevant apprenticeship standards
  • contact EPAO's
  • engage employers in the process of choosing an EPAO
  • confirm a contract or service agreement with EPAO's

You'll also need to include what information your organisation will ask from an EPAO to ensure they are suitable.

Validations.Name: Required
Validations.ErrorMessage: Tell us how your organisation will engage with end-point assessment organisations (EPAO's)

Validations.Name: MaxWordCount
Validations.ErrorMessage: Your answer must be 275 words or less
